name: Paynas B.V.
description: Developer of a payroll enrollment platform designed to provide banking services and benefits to small-sized companies and their employees. The company's platform provides multiple HR features such as employee and payroll management, recruitment management, task management, attendance management with a time logging track system, enabling clients to provide its employees hassle-free banking, HR management, and employee benefits in one place, and in a single workflow.
